name: APhysicsVolume
doc:
PhysicsVolume: A bounding volume which affects actor physics.
Each AActor is affected at any time by one PhysicsVolume.

TerminalVelocity: Terminal velocity of pawns using CharacterMovement when falling.
Priority: Determines which PhysicsVolume takes precedence if they overlap (higher number = higher priority).
FluidFriction: This property controls the amount of friction applied by the volume as pawns using CharacterMovement move through it. The higher this value, the harder it will feel to move through
bWaterVolume: True if this volume contains a fluid like water
bPhysicsOnContact: By default, the origin of an AActor must be inside a PhysicsVolume for it to affect the actor. However if this flag is true, the other actor only has to touch the volume to be affected by it.
